Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION
REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION

Title: Relates to sex offender residence limitation
Summary: Relates to sex offender residence limitation; restricts level two and three sex offenders from residing within 1,500 feet of their victims.
LawCode: Rel ยง168-w to be ยง168-x, add ยง168-w, Cor L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the correction law, in relation to restricting sex offenders from residing near the residence of their victim
